title: Lithium decorated 2D orthorhombic (o)-B2X2 monolayers for hydrogen storage: first principles calculations
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Ayoub BENADDI, Abdelali Elomrani, Mohammed Lamhani, Said Oukahou, Mohammad Maymoun, Mohamed Yassine Fatihi, Abdellatif Hasnaoui
Over the last few years, scientists and researchers have shown significant interest in the search for suitable two-dimensional (2D) materials that can store hydrogen efficiently, possess high gravimetric capacity, and...
